channel.title: Music – Free Arlo
channel.description: Recent content in Free Arlo on Music

item.title: Free Arlo - IRL
item.description:
I can see you in the summer time
Hella fine, yeah
85, with the top down speakers up
Got my hand on your thigh, now
I just wanna see it in real life

I be trying not to fall in love
But i might, yeah
Ridin’ high, on a vibe liquor in your cup
My divine, paradise, yeah
I just wanna see it in real life

I Got tea but i got no honey
I Got bills but i got no money
Tv only show me dummies
All i do it day dream, all i do is day dream

I Got friends but i still be lonely
I Got time but it’s moving slowly
I Might pray but i ain’t that holy
All i do is daydream, i dont wanna day dream

So save me from these walls yeah
Cause i been here too long, come on

I can see you in the summer timе
Hella fine, yeah
85, with thе top down speakers up
Got my hand on your thigh, now
I just wanna see it in real life

I’ll be trying not to fall in love
But i might, yeah
Ridin’ high, on a vibe liquor in your cup
My divine, paradise, yeah
I just wanna see it in real life

Well i’m stressed but i got no worries
Anxiety really gonna work me
Another drink isn’t gonna hurt me
All i do is day dream, all i do …

Too many faces on my phone screen
I’m so tired but you know i can’t sleep
Yeah I’m alive but i’m pushing daises
i don’t wanna day dream

So save me from these walls
Cause i been here too long, oh yeah

I can see you in the summer time
Hella fine, yeah
85, with the top down speakers up
Got my hand on your thigh, now
I just wanna see it in real life

I be trying not to fall in love
But i might, yeah
Ridin’ high, on a vibe liquor in your cup
My divine, paradise, yeah
I just wanna see it in real life
